description.value:
Potion, very rare
This potion is steeped using a blossom that grows only in the moonlight. When you drink this potion, your shadow corruption is reduced by three levels. If you arenâ€™t using shadow corruption, you gain the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{greater restoration} spell instead.
